attributes.additional_details:
Since we cannot petition the department for culture directly this petition is directed at the cabinet office which has the responsibility (according to its description on this very website) for  "ensuring value for money to the taxpayer for public sector workers. Maria is an MP - a public servant, hence the petition being directed to the cabinet office

We the undersigned do not feel maria miller is "value for money". We see no value in subsiding an MP's living expenses if they then sell that house for profit.
